entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @VP @WhiteHouse Vice President Pence.  I admire you greatly. If we do not have national control and severe consequence, this Covid19 could take our country down. Stop states from having a voice
